Articles.Content:
So I took a stab at making a video. I used Fraps and Windows Movie Maker to make this crappy little video. This is my first time making a video on a computer, not just of KSP. Let me just put it out there that the gameplay is boring and the audio narration is terrible. Do not expect anything amazing if you click the link. xD However, it took me like 2 hours to make from installing the software to publishing, so by George I'm posting it. lol

Would love some threads or articles where I could read up on how to do this kind of thing better.
Every march starts with it's first step. Go ahead, it isn't as bad as you try to state.
